summary.para: The AMCOPPCommand structure contains a Certified Output Protection Protocol (COPP) command.

remarks.para: The following COPP commands are defined.

item.description: Sets a specified protection type to a specified protection level.

remarks.para: For more information, see the Windows DDK documentation.

summary.para: Message Authentication Code (MAC) of the command data. Use AES-based one-key CBC MAC (OMAC) to calculate this value.
Sequence number. The application must keep a running count of the COPP commands issued. For each command, increment the sequence number by one.
Number of bytes of valid data in the CommandData member.
Data for the command. The meaning of the data depends on the command.
